mapper.select: select c.zwbmmc name,nvl(d.h_total,0) h_total,nvl(e.x_total,0) x_total from zwbm c left join (select a.zwbmmc name,count(a.xqxxzybm) h_total from ysxqxx a where a.sfhq='是' group by a.zwbmmc) d on c.zwbmmc=d.name left join (select b.zwbmmc name,count(b.xqxxzybm) x_total from ysxqxx b group by b.zwbmmc) e on c.zwbmmc=e.name order by x_total

SELECT a.zwbmmc name,COUNT(distinct(a.xxzybm)) total, (SELECT COUNT(distinct(xxzybm)) FROM xxzy WHERE a.zwbmmc = zwbmmc AND gxlx IN ( '政府内部条件共享', '政府内部强制共享','社会公开')) val1, (SELECT COUNT(distinct(xxzybm)) FROM xxzy WHERE a.zwbmmc = zwbmmc AND sfkf IN ( '无条件','内部' ) ) val2 FROM xxzy a where zwbmmc is not null GROUP BY a.zwbmbm,a.zwbmmc ORDER BY total DESC
select c.zwbmmc name,nvl(a.x_total,0) x_total from zwbm c left join (select b.zwbmmc name,count(b.xqxxzybm) x_total from ysxqxx b group by b.zwbmmc) a on c.zwbmmc=a.name order by x_total desc
select zwbmmc name,zwbmbm code,xxzybxqsl b_total from zwbm order by b_total desc

SELECT zwbmmc name, COUNT(xxzybm) total, COUNT(CASE WHEN ccjz = '数据库' THEN ccjz END) val1, COUNT(CASE WHEN ccjz = '电子表格' THEN ccjz END) val2, COUNT(CASE WHEN ccjz = '图形图像' THEN ccjz END) val3, COUNT(CASE WHEN ccjz = '电子文件' THEN ccjz END) val4, COUNT(CASE WHEN ccjz = '流媒体' THEN ccjz END) val5, COUNT(CASE WHEN ccjz = '其它' THEN ccjz END) val6 FROM (select distinct a.xxzybm,a.ccjz,a.zwbmbm,a.zwbmmc from xxzy a) GROUP BY zwbmbm,zwbmmc ORDER BY val1+val2+val3+val4+val5+val6 DESC

SELECT a.zwbmmc name, (SELECT COUNT(zwbmbm) FROM ywxt WHERE zwbmmc=a.zwbmmc ) val1, (COUNT(a.xxzybm)-(SELECT COUNT(zwbmbm) FROM ywxt WHERE zwbmmc=a.zwbmmc)) val2, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ywxtbm) FROM ywxt WHERE zwbmmc=a.zwbmmc AND ywxtjsxz='国家垂直系统') val3, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ywxtbm) FROM ywxt WHERE zwbmmc=a.zwbmmc AND ywxtjsxz='省级系统') val4, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ywxtbm) FROM ywxt WHERE zwbmmc=a.zwbmmc AND ywxtjsxz='州级系统') val5, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ywxtbm) FROM ywxt WHERE zwbmmc=a.zwbmmc AND ywxtjsxz='市级系统') val6, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ywxtbm) FROM ywxt WHERE zwbmmc=a.zwbmmc AND ywxtjsxz='自行开发') val7 FROM xxzy a GROUP BY a.zwbmmc ORDER BY val3+val4+val5+val6+val7 DESC
